name: Progressive Generation Inc.
description: Provider of content production and broadcasting services intended to produce content in multi-languages for multi-platforms. The company's services specialize in the making of animation artworks in both two-dimensional and three-dimensional environments with quality standards, enabling viewers to have creative, innovative, and profitable animated entertainment experiences.
one_liner: Provider of content production and broadcasting services intended to produce content in multi-languages for multi-platforms. The company's services specialize in the making of animation artworks in both two-dimensional and three-dimensional environments with quality standards, enabling viewers to have creative, innovative, and profitable animated entertainment experiences.
